Title: Requires parents direct all appeals for school immunization exemptions to the director of the board of immunizations; repealer
Summary: Requires parents direct all appeals for school immunization exemptions to the director of the bureau of immunizations; repeals provisions requiring such appeals be directed towards the commissioner of education.
LawCode: Rpld ยง310 sub 6-a, Ed L; amd ยง2164, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to directing parents file petitions for a child denied school entrance or attendance to the director of the bureau of immunizations; and to repeal subdivision 6-a of section 310 of the education law relating thereto
